statements: SELECT * FROM genetic_profiles;
SELECT id, name, age FROM genetic_profiles WHERE age > 30;
SELECT id, name, gender FROM genetic_profiles WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM genetic_profiles ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT name, genetic_code FROM genetic_profiles WHERE blood_type = 'O';
SELECT id, name, age, gender, blood_type FROM genetic_profiles WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM genetic_profiles WHERE blood_type LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT name, gender, blood_type FROM genetic_profiles WHERE age > 30 AND genetic_code IS NOT NULL;
SELECT id, name, genetic_code FROM genetic_profiles WHERE blood_type = 'O-' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM genetic_profiles WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 40;
SELECT * FROM genetic_profiles;
SELECT name, gender FROM genetic_profiles WHERE age > 30;
SELECT id, name, gender, age FROM genetic_profiles ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT id, name, age FROM genetic_profiles WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM medical_records;
SELECT * FROM genetic_profiles;
SELECT name, age FROM genetic_profiles WHERE age > 30;
SELECT profile_id, diagnosis FROM medical_records WHERE diagnosis LIKE 'cancer%';
SELECT id, name, gender FROM genetic_profiles WHERE gender IS NOT NULL ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT m.profile_id, g.name, m.diagnosis FROM medical_records m JOIN genetic_profiles g ON m.profile_id = g.id WHERE g.age < 50;
SELECT * FROM GeneticProfiles;
SELECT patient_name, genetic_code FROM GeneticProfiles;
SELECT patient_name, genetic_code FROM GeneticProfiles WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT disease_name, severity FROM Diseases;
SELECT * FROM Medications WHERE target_disease_id = 2;
SELECT patient_name, genetic_code FROM GeneticProfiles WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Diseases WHERE severity = 'severe';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name FROM GeneticProfiles ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT disease_name, severity FROM Diseases WHERE severity IN ('moderate', 'severe');
SELECT medication_name, disease_name FROM Medications INNER JOIN Diseases ON Medications.target_disease_id = Diseases.disease_id;
SELECT * FROM genetic_profiles;
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name FROM genetic_profiles;
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name, dob FROM genetic_profiles WHERE patient_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM medical_history ORDER BY date_diagnosed DESC;
SELECT patient_id, condition, medications FROM medical_history WHERE condition='Diabetes';
SELECT * FROM genetic_profiles ORDER BY last_name DESC, first_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name FROM genetic_profiles WHERE dob > '1990-01-01' AND dob < '2000-01-01';
SELECT patient_id, condition, date_diagnosed FROM medical_history WHERE condition LIKE '%cancer%' ORDER BY date_diagnosed DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT drug_name, study_title, patient_id FROM research_studies WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' AND end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT result_id, patient_id, test_name, result_value FROM lab_results WHERE date_tested BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT patient_name, patient_dob FROM genetic_profiles WHERE profile_id = 1;
SELECT diagnosis, prescription, visit_date FROM medical_records ORDER BY visit_date DESC;
SELECT researcher_name, specialty FROM researchers WHERE researcher_id = 2;
SELECT study_name, study_description FROM research_studies;

SELECT patient_name, patient_dob FROM genetic_profiles WHERE profile_id = 1;
SELECT record_id, diagnosis, prescription FROM medical_records WHERE visit_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM research_studies ORDER BY study_name DESC;
SELECT patient_id, profile_id, record_id, study_id, researcher_id FROM patient_records WHERE researcher_id = 3;
